flawed_nl_solution:
The number of floors is 12 floors/building x 2 buildings = 24 floors
The number of apartments is 6 apartments/floor x 24 floors = <<6*24=414>>414 apartments
The company has to buy 7 doors/apartment x 414 apartments = <<7*414=2898>>2898 doors
#### 2898

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 144, not 414. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
